uuid.description: The unique identifier (UUIDv4) of the measurement.

open_data_uuid.description: The open-data identifier (UUIDv4) of the measurement.

tag.description: A tag provided by the client.

measurements.description: Can contains the result of a Speed and/or QoS measurement.

time.description: This class extends the MeasurementTime class with relative time stamps.

start_time.description: Start Date and time for this (sub-) measurement. Date and time is always stored as UTC. Before showing date and time to the user it's converted to the users time zone by the client.

end_time.description: End Date and time for this (sub-) measurement. Date and time is always stored as UTC. Before showing date and time to the user it's converted to the users time zone by the client.

relative_start_time_ns.description: Start time in nanoseconds relative to the start time of the overall measurement object.

relative_end_time_ns.description: End time in nanoseconds relative to the end time of the overall measurement object.

status_info.description: Describes the status of a measurement.

reason.description: The reason why a measurement failed.

implausible.description: Flag to mark a measurement as implausible.

token.description: Measurement token generated by the collector.

version_protocol.description: The protocol version this measurement used, if available.

version_library.description: The library version this measurement used, if available.

source.description: Measurement source. Can be either own system or imported from open-data.

time.description: Start and end time stamps and the duration of a (sub) measurement.

start_time.description: Start Date and time for this (sub-) measurement. Date and time is always stored as UTC. Before showing date and time to the user it's converted to the users time zone by the client.

end_time.description: End Date and time for this (sub-) measurement. Date and time is always stored as UTC. Before showing date and time to the user it's converted to the users time zone by the client.

geo_location_info.description: Contains information about all geographic locations captured during the test.

geo_locations.description: List of all captured geographic locations.

time.description: Time and date the geographic location information was captured (UTC).

relative_time_ns.description: Relative time in nanoseconds (to measurement begin).

client_info.description: Contains information about the measurement client.

device_info.description: Contains information about the device the measurement software is running on.

os_info.description: Contains information about the client's OS.

name.description: Operating system name (e.g. Android or iOS).

api_level.description: API level of operating system or SDK (e.g. Android API level or Swift SDK version).

cpu_usage.description: CPU usage during the test, if available.

raw_values.description: The raw values with relative time and value which are used to calculate the statistics.

relative_time_ns.description: The relative time in nanoseconds to the measurement start.

value.description: The value recorded at this point in time.

min.description: Minimum value of data from rawValues.

max.description: Maximum value of data from rawValues.

mem_usage.description: Memory usage during the test, if available.

full_name.description: The device name that is commonly known to users (e.g. Google Pixel).

network_info.description: Contains network related information gathered during the test.

network_points_in_time.description: Contains all relevant network information of a single point in time.

time.description: Time and date the signal information was captured (UTC).

relative_time_ns.description: Relative time in nanoseconds (to test begin).

client_public_ip.description: Public IP address of the client.

client_public_ip_country_code.description: Country of the client which is gathered by Geo-IP lookup.

public_ip_rdns.description: Reverse DNS for the public IP address.

network_type.description: Contains information about the network type.

provider_info.description: Contains provider related information captured during the test.

public_ip_asn.description: ASN for the public IP address.

country_code_asn.description: Country code derived from the AS (e.g. "AT").

short_name.description: The short name (or shortcut) of the provider.

network_mobile_info.description: Contains mobile network information, if available.

network_country.description: The network operator country code (e.g. "AT"), if available.

network_operator_mcc_mnc.description: The MCC/MNC of the network operator, if available.

network_operator_name.description: The network operator name, if available.

sim_country.description: The SIM operator country code (e.g. "AT"), if available.

sim_operator_mcc_mnc.description: The MCC/MNC of the SIM operator, if available.

roaming.description: Indicates if this is a roaming connection, if available (null = unknown).

cell_location_info.description: Contains cell location information captured during the test.

area_code.description: Contains the area code (e.g. location area code (GSM), tracking area code (LTE)), if available.

time.description: Time and date the cell location information was captured (UTC).

primary_scrambling_code.description: Contains the primary scrambling code, if available.

arfcn.description: Contains the ARFCN (Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number) (e.g. 16-bit GSM ARFCN or 18-bit LTE EARFCN), if available.

relative_time_ns.description: Relative time in nanoseconds (to test begin).

latitude.description: Geographic location latitude of this cell.

longitude.description: Geographic location longitude of this cell.

signal_info.description: Contains signal information captured during the test.

network_type_id.description: Network type id as it gets returned by the Android API.

time.description: Time and date the signal information was captured (UTC).

relative_time_ns.description: Relative time in nanoseconds (to test begin).

wifi_link_speed_bps.description: The current WiFi link speed, in bits per second (If available).

wifi_rssi_dbm.description: The received signal strength indicator of the current 802.11 network, in dBm (If available).

signal_strength_2g3g_dbm.description: The received signal strength of 2G or 3G connections, in dBm (If available).

gsm_bit_error_rate.description: The bit error rate as defined in (ETSI) TS 27.007 8.5 (If available).

lte_rsrp_dbm.description: The LTE reference signal received power, in dBm (If available).

lte_rssnr_db.description: The LTE reference signal signal-to-noise ratio, in dB (If available).

lte_cqi.description: The LTE channel quality indicator (If available).

overhead_per_frame_including_slow_start.description: The overhead sent during the communication via the WebSocket protocol including slow-start phase.

overhead_per_frame.description: The overhead a single frame produces on average.

end_time.description: End Date and time for this (sub-) measurement. Date and time is always stored as UTC. Before showing date and time to the user it's converted to the users time zone by the client.

relative_end_time_ns.description: End time in nanoseconds relative to the end time of the overall measurement object.

reason.description: The reason why a measurement failed.

token.description: Measurement token generated by the collector.

version_protocol.description: The protocol version this measurement used, if available.

version_library.description: The library version this measurement used, if available.

condition_valid_from.description: Optional condition used to set the date this MCC/MNC mapping is valid from.

condition_valid_to.description: Optional condition used to set the date this MCC/MNC mapping is valid to.

status_info.description: Describes the status of a measurement.

reason.description: The reason why a measurement failed.

implausible.description: Flag to mark a measurement as implausible.

token.description: Measurement token generated by the collector.

version_protocol.description: The protocol version this measurement used, if available.

version_library.description: The library version this measurement used, if available.

results.description: Provides detailed information on all QoS results.

objective_id.description: A reference to the QoS objective ID.

type.description: The type of the given QoSResult (e.g. TCP, UDP).

results.description: Stores the result key-value pairs gathered from the QoS measurement execution.

implausible.description: Flag to mark this QoS measurement as implausible

rtt_ns.description: Round trip time recorded in nanoseconds.

relative_time_ns.description: Relative time in nanoseconds (to test begin).

requested_num_packets.description: The number of RTT packets to send, as instructed by the server.

num_sent.description: The actual number of sent RTT packets.

num_received.description: The actual number of received RTT packets.

num_error.description: The actual number of failed RTT packets.

num_missing.description: The actual number of missing RTT packets.

packet_size.description: The actual size of RTT packets.

min_log.description: Common logarithm of the minimum (best) RTT.

max_log.description: Common logarithm of the maximum (worst) RTT.

average_log.description: Common logarithm of the average RTT.

median_log.description: Common logarithm of the median RTT.

standard_deviation_ns.description: Calculated RTT standard deviation in nanoseconds.

os_info.description: Contains information about the client's OS.

name.description: Operating system name (e.g. Android or iOS).

api_level.description: API level of operating system or SDK (e.g. Android API level or Swift SDK version).

cpu_usage.description: CPU usage during the test, if available.

raw_values.description: The raw values with relative time and value which are used to calculate the statistics.

relative_time_ns.description: The relative time in nanoseconds to the measurement start.

value.description: The value recorded at this point in time.

min.description: Minimum value of data from rawValues.

max.description: Maximum value of data from rawValues.

mem_usage.description: Memory usage during the test, if available.

full_name.description: The device name that is commonly known to users (e.g. Google Pixel).

condition_rdns_suffix.description: The reverse DNS suffix, an optional condition for an ASN mapping (e.g.: .com).

stream_id.description: The stream id (numeric value starting from 0).

relative_time_ns.description: Relative time since start of the speed measurement.

bytes.description: Bytes transmitted or received since start of the speed measurement.

uuid.description: The client UUID (also serves as primary key).

registration_time.description: Time stamp in UTC when the client was registered.

tc_accepted.description: Flag if the terms and conditions were accepted by the client.

tc_accepted_version.description: Version of the terms and conditions that was accepted by the client.

tc_accepted_time.description: Time stamp when the latest terms and conditions (see termsAndConditionsAcceptedVersion) were accepted by the client.

uuid.description: A UUID which serves as primary key.

info.description: Contains additional detail information about a measurement server.

city.description: The city the measurement server is located in.

country.description: The country the measurement server is located in.

geo_location.description: The geographic location of the measurement server.

time.description: Time and date the geographic location information was captured (UTC).

relative_time_ns.description: Relative time in nanoseconds (to measurement begin).

address_ipv4.description: The measurement server's IPv4 address or name.

address_ipv6.description: The measurement server's IPv6 address or name.

enabled.description: Flag that indicates if this measurement server is enabled.

secret_key.description: The measurement server's secret key used to generate measurement tokens.

uuid.description: A UUID which serves as primary key.

urls.description: Contains the base URLs for the various services accessed by the client.

collector_service.description: Base URL of the collector/controller service of the form "[protocol]://[domain]:[port]/[path]". This domain name should have A and AAAA records.

collector_service_ipv4.description: IPv4-only base URL of the collector/controller service. This domain name must only have an A record.

collector_service_ipv6.description: IPv6-only base URL of the collector/controller service. This domain name must only have an AAAA record.

map_service.description: Base URL of the map service of the form "[protocol]://[domain]:[port]/[path]".

statistic_service.description: Base URL of the statistic service of the form "[protocol]://[domain]:[port]/[path]".

website.description: Base URL of the web site of the form "[protocol]://[domain]:[port]/[path]".

measurements.description: This map contains settings per measurement type.

max.description: Maximum value of data from rawValues.

translations.description: Key/value pairs containing translations for a specific language.

id.description: A ID which serves as primary key.

full_name.description: The device name that is commonly known to users (e.g. Google Pixel).

id.description: An ID which serves as primary key.

enabled.description: Flag if this QoS measurement objective is enabled.

type.description: Enum that holds the names of the available QoS measurement objectives.

concurrency_group.description: Objectives are ordered based on the concurrency group. Objectives that have the same concurrency group will be executed in parallel. Concurrency groups will be executed after each other in sorted order.

measurement_server_uuid.description: UUID of the measurement server that is used in the execution of this objective or null if the objective doesn't require a server.

translation_keys.description: Stores the translation keys for QoS objectives.

summary.description: Translation key name for the summary of this QoS objective.

description.description: Translation key name for the description of this QoS objective.

parameters.description: A map of QoS objective parameters (e.g. timeout, TCP port, web page URL)

evaluations.description: A list of custom evaluations for this QoS objective. Evaluations are used to present human readable results to the end user.

start_time.description: Start Date and time for this (sub-) measurement. Date and time is always stored as UTC. Before showing date and time to the user it's converted to the users time zone by the client.

end_time.description: End Date and time for this (sub-) measurement. Date and time is always stored as UTC. Before showing date and time to the user it's converted to the users time zone by the client.

network_country.description: The network operator country code (e.g. "AT"), if available.

network_operator_mcc_mnc.description: The MCC/MNC of the network operator, if available.

network_operator_name.description: The network operator name, if available.

sim_country.description: The SIM operator country code (e.g. "AT"), if available.

sim_operator_mcc_mnc.description: The MCC/MNC of the SIM operator, if available.

roaming.description: Indicates if this is a roaming connection, if available (null = unknown).

time.description: This class extends the MeasurementTime class with relative time stamps.

start_time.description: Start Date and time for this (sub-) measurement. Date and time is always stored as UTC. Before showing date and time to the user it's converted to the users time zone by the client.

end_time.description: End Date and time for this (sub-) measurement. Date and time is always stored as UTC. Before showing date and time to the user it's converted to the users time zone by the client.

relative_start_time_ns.description: Start time in nanoseconds relative to the start time of the overall measurement object.

relative_end_time_ns.description: End time in nanoseconds relative to the end time of the overall measurement object.

status_info.description: Describes the status of a measurement.

reason.description: The reason why a measurement failed.

implausible.description: Flag to mark a measurement as implausible.

token.description: Measurement token generated by the collector.

version_protocol.description: The protocol version this measurement used, if available.

version_library.description: The library version this measurement used, if available.

throughput_avg_download_bps.description: The calculated (average) download throughput in bits per second.

throughput_avg_download_log.description: Common logarithm of the (average) download throughput.

throughput_avg_upload_bps.description: The calculated (average) upload throughput in bits per second.

throughput_avg_upload_log.description: Common logarithm of the average upload throughput.

bytes_download.description: Bytes received during the speed measurement (Download) without slow-start phase.

bytes_download_including_slow_start.description: Bytes received during the speed measurement (Download) with slow-start phase.

bytes_upload.description: Bytes transferred during the speed measurement (Upload).

bytes_upload_including_slow_start.description: Bytes transferred during the speed measurement (Upload) with slow-start phase.

requested_duration_download_slow_start_n.description: The nominal duration for the download slow-start phase.

requested_duration_upload_slow_start_ns.description: The nominal duration for the upload slow-start phase.

requested_duration_download_ns.description: The nominal measurement duration of the download measurement.

requested_duration_upload_ns.description: The nominal measurement duration of the upload measurement.

relative_start_time_rtt_ns.description: Relative start time of the RTT measurement in nanoseconds.

relative_start_time_download_ns.description: Relative start time of the download measurement in nanoseconds.

relative_start_time_upload_ns.description: Relative start time of the upload measurement in nanoseconds.

rtt_info.description: Bytes transferred during the speed measurement (Upload)

rtt_ns.description: Round trip time recorded in nanoseconds.

relative_time_ns.description: Relative time in nanoseconds (to test begin).

requested_num_packets.description: The number of RTT packets to send, as instructed by the server.

num_sent.description: The actual number of sent RTT packets.

num_received.description: The actual number of received RTT packets.

num_error.description: The actual number of failed RTT packets.

num_missing.description: The actual number of missing RTT packets.

packet_size.description: The actual size of RTT packets.

min_log.description: Common logarithm of the minimum (best) RTT.

max_log.description: Common logarithm of the maximum (worst) RTT.

average_log.description: Common logarithm of the average RTT.

median_log.description: Common logarithm of the median RTT.

standard_deviation_ns.description: Calculated RTT standard deviation in nanoseconds.

speed_raw_data.description: Stores the raw data (amount of bytes in time) values for download and upload.

download.description: Contains a list of all captured byte transfers during the download speed measurement.

stream_id.description: The stream id (numeric value starting from 0).

relative_time_ns.description: Relative time since start of the speed measurement.

bytes.description: Bytes transmitted or received since start of the speed measurement.

upload.description: Contains a list of all captured byte transfers during the upload speed measurement.

connection_info.description: Contains information about the connection(s) used for the speed measurement.

address.description: The address of the measurement server.

encrypted.description: Indicates if the communication with the measurement server will be encrypted.

encryption_info.description: Cryptographic protocol and cipher suite used for encrypted communication, if available. E.g. TLSv1.2 (TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256).

client_interface_total_traffic.description: Contains information about total bytes transferred during the speed measurement, as reported by the client's interface, if available. Only used for displaying to the client.

client_interface_download_measurement_tr.description: Contains information about bytes transferred during the download measurement, as reported by the client's interface, if available. Only used for displaying to the client.

client_interface_upload_measurement_traf.description: Contains information about bytes transferred during the upload measurement, as reported by the client's interface, if available. Only used for displaying to the client.

num_streams_info.description: Contains information about requested number of streams and the actual number of streams used during the speed measurement.

requested_num_streams_download.description: The requested number of streams for the download measurement.

requested_num_streams_upload.description: The requested number of streams for the upload measurement.

actual_num_streams_download.description: The actual number of streams used by the download measurement.

actual_num_streams_upload.description: The actual number of streams used by the upload measurement.

tcp_opt_sack_requested.description: Flag if TCP SACK (Selective Acknowledgement) is enabled/requested.

tcp_opt_wscale_requested.description: Flag if the TCP window scale options are requested.

server_mss.description: Maximum Segment Size (MSS) value from the server-side.

server_mtu.description: Maximum Transmission Unit (MTU) value from the server-side.

web_socket_info_download.description: This class contains additional information gathered from the WebSocket protocol during the download measurement.

frame_size.description: Size of a transmitted frame over the WebSocket protocol.

frame_count.description: Number of frames sent over the WebSocket protocol during measurement excluding slow-start phase.

frame_count_including_slow_start.description: Number of frames sent over the WebSocket protocol during measurement including slow-start phase.

overhead.description: The overhead sent during the communication via the WebSocket protocol excluding slow-start phase.

overhead_per_frame_including_slow_start.description: The overhead sent during the communication via the WebSocket protocol including slow-start phase.

overhead_per_frame.description: The overhead a single frame produces on average.

web_socket_info_upload.description: This class contains additional information gathered from the WebSocket protocol during the upload measurement.

area_code.description: Contains the area code (e.g. location area code (GSM), tracking area code (LTE)), if available.

time.description: Time and date the cell location information was captured (UTC).

primary_scrambling_code.description: Contains the primary scrambling code, if available.

arfcn.description: Contains the ARFCN (Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number) (e.g. 16-bit GSM ARFCN or 18-bit LTE EARFCN), if available.

relative_time_ns.description: Relative time in nanoseconds (to test begin).

latitude.description: Geographic location latitude of this cell.

longitude.description: Geographic location longitude of this cell.

short_name.description: The short name (or shortcut) of the provider.

id.description: A ID which serves as primary key.

asn_mappings.description: Contains a list of all valid/possible ASN mappings for this provider.

condition_rdns_suffix.description: The reverse DNS suffix, an optional condition for an ASN mapping (e.g.: .com).

mcc_mnc_mappings.description: Contains a list of all valid/possible MCC/MNC mappings for this provider.

condition_valid_from.description: Optional condition used to set the date this MCC/MNC mapping is valid from.

condition_valid_to.description: Optional condition used to set the date this MCC/MNC mapping is valid to.

requested_num_streams_download.description: The requested number of streams for the download measurement.

requested_num_streams_upload.description: The requested number of streams for the upload measurement.

actual_num_streams_download.description: The actual number of streams used by the download measurement.

actual_num_streams_upload.description: The actual number of streams used by the upload measurement.

objective_id.description: A reference to the QoS objective ID.

type.description: The type of the given QoSResult (e.g. TCP, UDP).

results.description: Stores the result key-value pairs gathered from the QoS measurement execution.

implausible.description: Flag to mark this QoS measurement as implausible

short_name.description: The short name (or shortcut) of the provider.

reason.description: The reason why a measurement failed.

address.description: The address of the measurement server.

encrypted.description: Indicates if the communication with the measurement server will be encrypted.

encryption_info.description: Cryptographic protocol and cipher suite used for encrypted communication, if available. E.g. TLSv1.2 (TLS_RSA_WITH_AES_128_GCM_SHA256).

client_interface_total_traffic.description: Contains information about total bytes transferred during the speed measurement, as reported by the client's interface, if available. Only used for displaying to the client.

client_interface_download_measurement_tr.description: Contains information about bytes transferred during the download measurement, as reported by the client's interface, if available. Only used for displaying to the client.

client_interface_upload_measurement_traf.description: Contains information about bytes transferred during the upload measurement, as reported by the client's interface, if available. Only used for displaying to the client.

num_streams_info.description: Contains information about requested number of streams and the actual number of streams used during the speed measurement.

requested_num_streams_download.description: The requested number of streams for the download measurement.

requested_num_streams_upload.description: The requested number of streams for the upload measurement.

actual_num_streams_download.description: The actual number of streams used by the download measurement.

actual_num_streams_upload.description: The actual number of streams used by the upload measurement.

tcp_opt_sack_requested.description: Flag if TCP SACK (Selective Acknowledgement) is enabled/requested.

tcp_opt_wscale_requested.description: Flag if the TCP window scale options are requested.

server_mss.description: Maximum Segment Size (MSS) value from the server-side.

server_mtu.description: Maximum Transmission Unit (MTU) value from the server-side.

web_socket_info_download.description: This class contains additional information gathered from the WebSocket protocol during the download measurement.

frame_size.description: Size of a transmitted frame over the WebSocket protocol.

frame_count.description: Number of frames sent over the WebSocket protocol during measurement excluding slow-start phase.

frame_count_including_slow_start.description: Number of frames sent over the WebSocket protocol during measurement including slow-start phase.

overhead.description: The overhead sent during the communication via the WebSocket protocol excluding slow-start phase.

overhead_per_frame_including_slow_start.description: The overhead sent during the communication via the WebSocket protocol including slow-start phase.

overhead_per_frame.description: The overhead a single frame produces on average.

web_socket_info_upload.description: This class contains additional information gathered from the WebSocket protocol during the upload measurement.

time.description: Time and date the geographic location information was captured (UTC).

relative_time_ns.description: Relative time in nanoseconds (to measurement begin).
